sub_workout_group.name: Beginner Joint Mobility
sub_workout_group.description: Gentle joint mobility exercises to improve movement fluidity and prevent stiffness.

sub_workouts.name: Neck Circles
sub_workouts.description: Slowly rotate your neck in a circular motion to improve cervical mobility.

sub_workouts.name: Shoulder Rolls
sub_workouts.description: Roll your shoulders forward and backward in smooth, controlled motions.

sub_workouts.name: Elbow Rotations
sub_workouts.description: Rotate your elbows in circles, keeping your upper arms steady.

sub_workouts.name: Wrist Flex & Extend
sub_workouts.description: Gently move your wrists up and down to improve flexibility.

sub_workouts.name: Hip Circles
sub_workouts.description: Rotate your hips in large, slow circles to enhance mobility.

sub_workouts.name: Knee Circles
sub_workouts.description: Stand with feet together and gently rotate your knees in circles.

sub_workouts.name: Ankle Rolls
sub_workouts.description: Lift one foot off the ground and rotate your ankle in smooth circles.

sub_workout_group.name: Advanced Joint Mobility
sub_workout_group.description: More dynamic and targeted joint mobility drills for improved flexibility and movement efficiency.

sub_workouts.name: Thoracic Spine Rotations
sub_workouts.description: Rotate your upper back while seated or in a half-kneeling position.

sub_workouts.name: Shoulder CARs (Controlled Articular Rotations)
sub_workouts.description: Move your shoulder through its full range of motion in a controlled manner.

sub_workouts.name: Wrist Circles with Resistance
sub_workouts.description: Hold a light resistance band while performing slow, controlled wrist circles.

sub_workouts.name: Hip CARs
sub_workouts.description: Move your hip joint through its complete range of motion while standing or in a quadruped position.

sub_workouts.name: Deep Squat Mobility Drill
sub_workouts.description: Sit in a deep squat and shift your weight from side to side to improve ankle, knee, and hip mobility.

sub_workouts.name: Ankle Dorsiflexion Stretch
sub_workouts.description: Gently rock forward while keeping the heel planted to improve ankle mobility.

sub_workout_group.name: Super Joint Mobility
sub_workout_group.description: Elite joint mobility drills for maximizing range of motion, control, and joint resilience.

sub_workouts.name: Hanging Shoulder Rotations
sub_workouts.description: Hang from a bar and slowly rotate your shoulders through different angles.

sub_workouts.name: Full Bridge Press
sub_workouts.description: Push up into a full bridge position while maintaining control through the shoulders and spine.

sub_workouts.name: Dynamic Scapular Control
sub_workouts.description: Perform controlled scapular retractions and depressions in a hanging or plank position.

sub_workouts.name: 90/90 Flow Sequence
sub_workouts.description: Move dynamically between seated 90/90 hip positions while keeping the spine tall.

sub_workouts.name: Extreme Spinal Wave Control
sub_workouts.description: Perform a full spinal wave, segment by segment, from head to tailbone with perfect control.

sub_workouts.name: Deep Ankle & Toe Stretch
sub_workouts.description: Sit on your heels with toes flexed under to deeply stretch the ankle and toe joints.
